about_the_game:
A soundtrack worthy of the cassette collection!

From the individual games to choosing what song to put on the jukebox inspired by some of the great records of the early 90s, the Arcade Paradise soundtrack captures the heart of a bygone era.

About this track :

"Wipe Your Tears Away" Is taken from Disc 3 of the Arcade Paradise OST and was created by Klaxonic (feat. Darci Rox)
detailed_description:
WISHLIST MEOW! 😻


About the Game

A soundtrack worthy of the cassette collection!

From the individual games to choosing what song to put on the jukebox inspired by some of the great records of the early 90s, the Arcade Paradise soundtrack captures the heart of a bygone era.

About this track :

"Wipe Your Tears Away" Is taken from Disc 3 of the Arcade Paradise OST and was created by Klaxonic (feat. Darci Rox)
